quote_first: When a clock struck noon in Washington, D.C., the time was
quote_last: in Philadelphia, 12:12 in New York, and 12:24 in Boston.
quote_raw: When a clock struck noon in Washington, D.C., the time was 12:08 in Philadelphia, 12:12 in New York, and 12:24 in Boston.
title: Eighty Days
author: Matthew Goodman
